meanings.sent1: The coruscating stars lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Her coruscating smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The coruscating disco ball made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The coruscating diamonds on her necklace caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The coruscating fireworks painted a beautiful picture in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The coruscating sun warmed the earth.
meanings.sent2: The coruscating lighthouse guided ships safely to shore.
meanings.sent3: The coruscating trophy gleamed proudly on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: Her coruscating personality always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The coruscating moonlight illuminated the path ahead.

meanings.definition: Brilliant or striking in style or effect
meanings.sent1: The coruscating fireworks display was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: His coruscating wit always kept his friends entertained.
meanings.sent3: The coruscating painting left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her coruscating performance on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The coruscating dress she wore stole the show at the party.
